about.description: ID Holding International specializes in the transport of mining products, containers and fuel. Our expertise and modern fleet allow us to offer superior quality services.

quality.title: Quality Approach
quality.description: Our commitment to quality and safety is reflected in international certifications and rigorous procedures.

services.intro: Discover all our transport services tailored to the needs of the mining industry, international trade and the oil sector. ID Holding International is your trusted partner for all your transport needs in Ivory Coast and the sub-region. With over 10 years of experience and a fleet of more than 350 modern vehicles, we offer complete and customized logistics solutions. Our expertise covers the transport of mining products (bauxite, manganese, gold, iron), maritime container transport from ports to your warehouses, and secure transport of fuels and petroleum products. We take pride in respecting deadlines, guaranteeing the safety of your goods and providing you with superior quality service. Our qualified teams and vehicles equipped with GPS systems ensure real-time tracking and complete traceability of your shipments.

fleet.intro: With over 350 vehicles, ID Holding has one of the largest fleets in Ivory Coast.
